data.eml:eml: A new snake of the genus Atractus Wagler, 1828 (Reptilia: Squamata: Colubridae) from Kaieteur National Park, Guyana, northeastern South America

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kok, Philippe J. R. (2006): A new snake of the genus Atractus Wagler, 1828 (Reptilia: Squamata: Colubridae) from Kaieteur National Park, Guyana, northeastern South America. Zootaxa 1378: 19-35, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.175024
